About Me

Let me tell you about me

BIO

A Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of solving problems with skills in programming languages like Java, Java-script, and kotlin. Information technology professional with a Bachelor of Science (B.Sc.) degree focused on geophysics from Adekunle Ajasin University. With a solid knowledge of Geographic Information Systems (GIS), Ayooluwa has worked with different firms ranging from civil engineering to environmental engineering. Having a passion for business, he is one of the co-founders of a fast-growing business called Psirius koncept who are into media and fashion. He believes he can affect his society with his technological innovations.

Transporta Ng

Mobile Development

Built the mobile app for a Transport business startup in Ekiti State Nigeria, which is focused on giving access so affordable transportation.
